testcase.classname: Testcases for checks on the Derived Product functionality
testcase.name: TC1-Validate the footer hyperlink links and highlight if any duplicates - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User opens the "chrome" and loads the "DP2_URL".......................passed When I am on the DP Home Page and do some quick element loaded validations..passed And I scroll to the bottom of the page to the footer section................passed And I count the total hyperlinks in the DP footer section save these links into a csv file highlighting duplicates.passed And I attach the generated csv file to the test report......................passed
